package.name: firesphere/silverstripe-newsmodule
package.description: A ModelAdmin based newsmodule to prevent clutter in the SiteTree

dev-master.name: firesphere/silverstripe-newsmodule
dev-master.description: A ModelAdmin based newsmodule to prevent clutter in the SiteTree

suggest.colymba\/gridfield-gallery-theme: Wanna see the images in slideshow gridfield?
suggest.silverstripe\/translatable: If you need your stuff translated.
suggest.unclecheese\/display-logic: Hide some fields and show only if required.
suggest.undefinedoffset\/sortablegridfield: Unfortunately you'll need this to get slideshow sortable with gallery theme.
suggest.wernerkrauss\/folderperpage: create a seperate folder for each news item.
suggest.kinglozzer\/silverstripe-multiselectfiel: To use a multiselect-field instead of a checkboxset.
